summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3395 for the improvement of Alley in Block Four (4), Brooklyn Addition, being the Alley between 11th Avenue Northeast and 12th Avenue Northeast, from East 43rd Street to East 45th Street; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 42147, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
